item.title: Roblox: Forge a Weapon Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Forge a Weapon is a Roblox game where, as the name suggests, you forge a weapon and become a blacksmith. If you are an experienced gamer, you will quickly figure out what's what, as the game is filled with the most popular mechanics from other Roblox experiences. You will find yourself in a location with a bunch of forges where you and other players will develop your craft. All you need to do is buy precious metals, upgrade your equipment, and, of course, forge.

The game immerses you in the gameplay quite quickly, but it is usually difficult for Roblox newbies to progress without spending Robux. Fortunately, the game offers the opportunity to get free rewards. All you need to do is redeem the Forge a Weapon codes from our guide.

Updated August 17, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Right now, only one active code is available in Forge a Weapon , and it grants Blueprints. It’s a simple way to get a useful resource for your progress. More codes and rewards may be added in the future, so it’s a good idea to check back regularly.

All Forge a Weapon Codes

Working Forge a Weapon Codes

  • /codes LikegoalReachedOrSomethingIdk - Redeem this code to get Blueprints. (NEW)

Expired Forge a Weapon Codes

  • /codes omglikeholymolyguakamoly - Redeem this code to get Gold Metal Packs

How to Redeem Codes in Forge a Weapon

The redemption feature is available in many Roblox games. Developers try to make it accessible to players so that they stay in the game for as long as possible. Often, this option can be found directly in the game interface or in the settings, but in Forge a Weapon , it works a little differently. In this game, you have to open the chat and enter a code with a special command for it to work. It only takes a few clicks, but even experienced players may find it difficult to understand what to do. That's why we've created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Forge a Weapon :

  • Launch Roblox and open Forge a Weapon .
  • Look at the upper left corner of the screen. You need to click on the game chat button.
  • Next, enter the code with the command in the text field exactly as written above. Press the send message button or Enter on your keyboard. This message will not be sent to the general chat, but you will receive rewards and a thank-you message from the developers.

The code must be active to receive rewards. So redeem it as soon as possible before it expires.

How to Get More Forge a Weapon Codes

You can find more working Roblox codes on our website. We regularly update our guides so that you can always get up-to-date and cool rewards. However, you can also visit the game developers' social media listed below:

  • Forge a Weapon Roblox game page
  • Forge a Weapon Roblox group
  • Forge a Weapon Discord server
Roblox

8.8 /10

September 1, 2006

item.title: Roblox: Obby For Free UGC Items Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
As the name suggests, Obby For Free UGC Items allows you to farm free UGCs. Even just AFK, you can farm Points per second. At the same time, reaching checkpoints in the obby will earn you 100 Points each time. However, there is a way to earn thousands of Points in just a few clicks, namely by using Obby For Free UGC Items codes.

Points are the main currency in this Roblox experience. And codes can reward you with huge amounts of money. Their disadvantage is a short validity period, so we do not recommend delaying their use.

Updated August 17, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new code is available in Obby For Free UGC Items, offering points that can be used in the game. The latest addition gives you a chance to claim a significant boost to your points balance. Other active codes also provide extra points, so there are multiple rewards to collect. Check back regularly, as we update this guide whenever new codes are released.

All Obby For Free UGC Items Codes

Working Obby For Free UGC Items Codes

  • 175K - Redeem this code to get 5,000 Points (NEW)
  • STARTER - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Points
  • FREE2025 - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Points
  • SUPER - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Points
  • WELCOME - Redeem this code to get 2,000 Points

Expired Obby For Free UGC Items Codes

  • 100K
  • DAILYREWARDS
  • JULY2025
  • 80K
  • 15K
  • 60K

At first, you may think that the challenges in Obby For Free UGC Items are quite simple. And this is true, but only in the initial stages. The further you progress, the more difficult the challenges await you. Along the way, you will encounter new elements, such as yellow blocks that ragdoll players when touched. Because of this, earning Points by reaching checkpoints will become more and more costly. However, you can get extra points using Obby For Free UGC Items codes.

Each of these Roblox codes contains different amounts of Points. Some of them can reward you with up to 5,000 Points at a time. However, it is worth noting that their validity is limited. And if you do not have time to use them during this period, the codes will expire, and the rewards will no longer be available.

How to Redeem Obby For Free UGC Items Codes

Now that you know how Obby For Free UGC Items codes will bring you goodies, you'll want to know how to use them. Luckily, the redemption option works no differently than in most other Roblox games. So just follow these steps:

  • First, launch the Obby For Free UGC Items experience.
  • Next, click on the Codes button on the left side of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code in the new window and click the Redeem button.

If you do everything correctly and the code is still active, you will see a message about receiving rewards. It is also worth noting that Roblox is case-sensitive, so copy and paste the codes instead of typing them manually. This way you can avoid typos.

How to Get More Obby For Free UGC Items Codes

Developers release new Obby For Free UGC Items codes quite often. So you should start following their official social media pages. There you will find all the news about the game, including giveaways:

  • Nectar Creations Roblox group
  • Nectar Creations Discord server

item.title: Roblox: Type Soul Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Type Soul Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Type Soul
  • How to Play Type Soul
  • The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Type Soul
  • About the Type Soul Developers

Type Soul is a Roblox game set in the world of Bleach , where players must embark upon an incredible journey. The game offers a challenging experience where fans choose their path as Quincy, Hollow, or the popular choice, a Soul Reaper. By completing quests, missions, and PvP battles, players unlock powerful abilities such as Shikai and explore the various divisions of Soul Society.

The game combines strategy, character progression, and intense gameplay to deliver an engaging experience. Below, Roblox players will find all of the latest codes for Type Soul that offer different in-game rewards. So let's stop talking and dive right into the codes.

Updated August 17, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A fresh set of codes is now available in Type Soul , each offering rewards you can claim. The latest additions provide a variety of bonuses that can help you progress or enjoy the game in different ways. You can redeem these codes to make the most of the available rewards. It’s a good idea to check back regularly, as new codes may continue to appear in future updates.

  • 10klikes - Redeem this code to claim Blue Pill.
  • sorryforshutdown - Redeem this code to claim Soul Ticket.

How to Redeem Codes for Type Soul

If players want to redeem the aforementioned codes, the process is quite straightforward. Just like in most other Roblox games, everything is done very simply and just requires a few buttons. But if fans still need help with the redemption, they can refer to the step-by-step instructions below:

  • First, it is necessary to launch Type Soul .
  • After that, press Play.
  • If the user is playing for the first time, then they will need to choose a gender and come up with a name.
  • After the player appears in the game, they should find and click or tap on the red button in the form of a gift; it is located on the top left but is semi-transparent, so it can be difficult to see.
  • When the button is pressed, a menu will appear with the Enter Code Here field in which fans must enter the code.
  • To redeem the code, just press Enter.

Also, keep in mind that each code can be redeemed only once per account.

How to Play Type Soul

At first glance, Type Soul is a rather complicated anime game. However, if players want to take their first steps and don't know where to start, this is no longer a problem. As a Lost Soul, players can choose one of three races in the game: Hollow, Quincy, or Soul Reaper. Below they will find some simple steps to take at the beginning of the game to successfully integrate into it:

Becoming a Hollow

To become a Hollow, press Ctrl K. But if the players don't want to be Hollow, then don't use this button at all.

Becoming a Quincy

  • As a Lost Soul, look for the Wanda gate located at coordinates xx:10 and xx:40. It has a blue side on the right and a white side on the left.
  • The gate is open for 10 minutes at specific times.
  • Enter the gate and follow the path to find a statue NPC that asks if players worship the king.
  • Interact with this NPC to become a Quincy.

Becoming a Soul Reaper

Currently, there are two ways to become a Soul Reaper: purification and a Shinigami Quest.

  • Players can ask a Soul Reaper player to purify them.
  • Keep an eye out for the Shinigami Quest, which may offer an alternative path to becoming a Soul Reaper.

The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Type Soul

Players looking for a new gaming experience need to look any further. Below they will find the 5 best games similar to Type Soul . Every anime fan will be able to find something for themselves:

  • Anime Adventures

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 6's Rumored Game Length is a Double-Edged Sword
item.description:
Few games carry the kind of weight and anticipation that Grand Theft Auto 6 does. Rockstar’s flagship series has defined open-world gaming for over two decades, consistently pushing boundaries with its scale, storytelling, and cultural impact with every release. From the neon streets of Vice City to the sprawling metropolis of Los Santos, every entry has become more than a game. It’s a proper cultural event. That’s why the wait for GTA 6 has been and still is so intense. Rockstar hasn’t released a new mainline entry for the franchise in over a decade, and with delays, the anticipation cannot be higher. There's a lot of hype for fresh characters, a new setting, and the next evolution of Rockstar’s design philosophy.

Each leak or rumor, no matter how small, sparks headlines and speculation about how this long-awaited sequel will raise the bar. The latest GTA 6 rumor surrounds the game’s length, with reports suggesting a campaign that could stretch to an astonishing 75 hours. That’s longer than Red Dead Redemption 2 ’s already demanding runtime, promising an experience that could consume players for weeks, or even months. On the surface, it sounds like a win for anyone hoping for a game they can immerse themselves in. But as with many ambitious design choices, it comes with trade-offs that could make GTA 6 ’s length a double-edged sword.

The Good and the Bad of a 75-Hour Campaign For Grand Theft Auto 6

For fans who thrive on the experiences open-world games offer, the rumored runtime is an undeniable win. It signals a deep commitment from Rockstar to craft a story that doesn’t just skim the surface but allows for world-building, character arcs, and countless opportunities to get lost in the details. Games of this length often encourage exploration of every side quest, activity, and hidden narrative thread, extending the lifespan of the experience far beyond the main story.

It also fits Rockstar’s track record. Red Dead Redemption 2 ’s runtime delivered a massive tale of loyalty and betrayal, and GTA 6 is expected to bring that same attention to character development, and perhaps on an even larger scale. With so much time dedicated to the story, players can expect to see protagonists evolve in ways that shorter games can’t always deliver, making for a narrative that feels more like a prestige television series than a quick blockbuster.

The Drawbacks of a Long Campaign

On the other hand, 75 hours is a serious time commitment for most adults. For many players, particularly older fans who grew up with the franchise but now juggle jobs, families, and responsibilities, it could take weeks, if not months, to see the credits roll. That leaves a lot of room for GTA 6 plot spoilers to slip through social media or online discussions before players have the chance to finish the game themselves.

The length also risks alienating those who prefer a more streamlined experience. A game with a short campaign (about 20-30 hours) can be knocked out in a week of steady play, creating a shared cultural moment where everyone experiences the story together. This model doesn’t leave much room for side quests or exploration, but it does offer the flexibility many players want or even need. A campaign three times as long makes it harder to maintain that same sense of community at launch.

The Balancing Act

Ultimately, the rumored length of Grand Theft Auto 6 reflects Rockstar’s ambition. But it’s also a gamble. A massive campaign ensures value for players who want to live in the world of Vice City for months on end. Yet for others, it risks becoming an obligation rather than an escape.

Both perspectives are valid—especially since this rumor does not clarify whether the speculated 75-hour commitment is for the main story or the full experience. Longer games can deliver unforgettable journeys, but part of this title’s audience has the luxury of seeing them through at the same pace. Whether this rumored length turns out to be a blessing or a burden may depend entirely on how much time each player can carve out for Rockstar’s most ambitious project yet.

Jason and Lucia have always known the deck is stacked against them. But when an easy score goes wrong, they find themselves on the darkest side of the sunniest place in America, in the middle of a criminal conspiracy stretching across the state of Leonida — forced to rely on each other more than ever if they want to make it out alive.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail Leaks Third Anniversary Character
item.description:
A new leak from Honkai: Star Rail is hinting at a major new character for the game's third anniversary next year, bringing Yae Sakura to Star Rail 's roster. The sci-fi RPG from HoYoverse has featured a wide variety of different characters for players to add to their team for more than two years since the game's launch. Honkai: Star Rail recently introduced Hysilens to the playable roster with the launch of the Version 3.5 update, with Cerydra set to join the game later in the patch. Now, new leaks are hinting at another Honkai Impact 3rd import.

Given its status as a spinoff of Honkai Impact 3rd , Honkai: Star Rail has welcomed plenty of homages to its predecessor within the roster. Characters like Bronya, Seele, and Acheron all serve as alternate versions of pre-existing characters from Honkai Impact 3rd , often containing plenty of tongue-in-cheek references to the previous game. HoYoverse has even confirmed that the Welt Yang aboard the Astral Express is the same character that featured prominently within the main story of Honkai Impact 3rd . A recent leak is now suggesting that a fan-favorite Honkai Impact 3rd character will hit Star Rail next year.

A new update shared by prominent HoYoverse leaker Anon Leaks is teasing the addition of Yae Sakura to Honkai: Star Rail . According to the leak, Honkai: Star Rail 's next anniversary update, said to be Version 4.2, will add the Star Rail version of Yae Sakura to the playable roster, expected to debut as an Ice Elation character. The leak even suggests that HoYoverse is designing an entire team composition around Yae Sakura, referring to the team composition as "Elation Battleship." Honkai: Star Rail 's Version 4.2 is expected to launch in April 2026.

Honkai: Star Rail Leaks Yae Sakura for Third Anniversary

The new information about Yae Sakura's release comes as leaks have already begun to give fans some clues about her Star Rail debut. Yae Sakura will release as a member of Honkai: Star Rail 's next new Path said to be coming with the fifth playable world, introducing a playable Elation Path. Previous information has also hinted at other characters who will be joining the new Path, with the typical Trailblazer variant being accompanied by a new version of popular five-star character Sparkle.

Honkai: Star Rail 's roster will be receiving plenty of exciting additions soon and players won't have to wait until Yae Sakura's release. HoYoverse has already teased the new characters coming to the game in Version 3.6, with both March 7th and Dan Heng confirmed to be receiving new variants. Evernight will join the game as an Ice Remembrance character, teased to potentially be March 7th with her memories re-awakened, while Dan Heng's "Permansor Terrae" will debut as a Physical Preservation character. Honkai: Star Rail 's roster looks to be expanding substantially in the near future.
